about_the_game:
Last Warrior Arena is a roguelike strategy combat game, where you choose your class and develop your warrior by choosing stats, skills and buying and upgrading equipment. Your goal is to go as far as you can in the arena, fighting bosses in your way. Loosing to a boss will result in perma-death. All enemies and items have fully randomized stats. Therefore, each run is unique as you get different enemies and items.

Game focuses a lot on strategic decisions as assigning points to chosen stats and skills and also by buying the chosen equipment. You can try hundreds different strategies by playing many games and find out which one is the best to go the farthest on the arena.

STORY

One day evil appeared in a world where there was peace. this evil destroyed everything around. There have been many who have tried to fight this evil, but each of them has failed. But hope is not lost yet, because there is one hero who can destroy this evil.

KEY FEATURES

- Classes
- Stats, Skills,
- Inventory,
- Enemies, Bosses, Dungeon Monsters, Catacomb Monsters,
- Equipment, Runes, Potions, Food, Books, Fishing rods, Scrolls, Magic Stones, Elixirs, Resources and more,
- Common, Rare, Epic and Legendary Equipment,
- Arena, Dungeons, Catacombs, Character, Expeditions, Skill Tree, Armour Shop, Magic Shop, Food Shop, Tavern, Fisherman, Mine, Blacksmith, Black Market, Weapon Enchanter, Runes, and more.
